Description_lang: Each time you cast Sheilun's Gift, you learn one of Shaohao's Lessons for up to $s1 sec, with the duration based on how many clouds of mist are consumed.|cffffffffLesson of Doubt|r: Your spells and abilities deal up to $400097s1% more healing and damage to targets, based on their current health.|cffffffffLesson of Despair|r: Your Critical Strike is increased by $400100s1% while above $400100s2% health.|cffffffffLesson of Fear|r: Decreases your damage taken by $400103s1% and increases your Haste by $400103s2%.|cffffffffLesson of Anger|r: $400106s1% of the damage or healing you deal is duplicated every $400106s2 sec.
